Uses of Class
com.samskivert.util.ObserverList

  • Packages that use ObserverList 
    Package Description
    com.samskivert.util
    Provides a variety of utility services including data structures, synchronization support, text processing and more.

    • Uses of ObserverList in com.samskivert.util

      Subclasses of ObserverList in com.samskivert.util 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  ResultListenerList<T>
      Multiplexes ResultListener responses to multiple ResultListeners.
      class  WeakObserverList<T>
      An ObserverList equivalent that does not prevent added observers from being garbage-collected.
      Methods in com.samskivert.util that return ObserverList 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static <T> ObserverList<T> ObserverList.newFastUnsafe()
      Creates an observer list with ObserverList.Policy.FAST_UNSAFE notification policy.
      static <T> ObserverList<T> ObserverList.newList(int notifyPolicy)
      Deprecated. 
      Switch to ObserverList.Policy constants.
      static <T> ObserverList<T> ObserverList.newList(ObserverList.Policy notifyPolicy)
      Creates an observer list with the specified notification policy.
      static <T> ObserverList<T> ObserverList.newSafeInOrder()
      Creates an observer list with ObserverList.Policy.SAFE_IN_ORDER notification policy.
      abstract ObserverList<T> ObserverList.setCheckDuplicates(boolean checkDuplicates)
      Configures this observer list to check duplicates when adding observers, or not.
      ObserverList<T> DependencyGraph.toObserverList()
      Flattens this graph into an observer list in dependencys order.
